value.stringValue: Id IN (select rstk__socarriervia_shipvia__c from rstk__socarriervia__c where rstk__socarriervia_carrier__c = 'I7_Filter Value')

fields.name: solineIdsvalidation
fields.fieldText: Please Select at least one Sales Order Line to process.

fields.name: solinesMaxLinesValidation
fields.fieldText: Limiting Lines available to update to the system maximum of {!MaximumGlobalLinesFormula}.

fields.name: Result_Screen
fields.fieldText: A background Batch Process has been created for this transaction. Please wait until the Background Batch Process gets completed and then click on the Finish button Click here to open Background Batch Process record and view the status of it.

fields.name: Validation_Message
fields.fieldText: Some of the lines selected have at least 1 Quantity Issued, these will only have their Case updated.

fields.name: ValidationMessage
fields.fieldText: Both the Carrier and Ship Method must be defined when either is selected.
